GeneDef.label: fleshmass immunity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh organ that adapts to diseases, providing permanent immunity to known diseases.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Forms <color=#8a8ae6>permanent immunity</color> to diseases some time after receiving them.
Does <color=#8a8ae6>not cure</color> an already acquired disease.
